20110131170332.000|20110131170334.000|TR0|right below me who are actually praying 
20110131170334.000|20110131170337.000|TR0|right now on their knees in the street.  
20110131170337.000|20110131170339.000|TR0|That is a repeated kind of sign we've seen 
20110131170339.000|20110131170342.000|TR0|here throughout the demonstrations.
20110131170342.000|20110131170344.000|TR0|

20110131170352.000|20110131170354.000|TR0|traffic police at some intersections.  But

20110131170402.000|20110131170404.000|TR0|they're out in force with tanks, armored 
20110131170404.000|20110131170407.000|TR0|personnel carriers.
20110131170407.000|20110131170410.000|TR0|

20110131170412.000|20110131170415.000|TR0|criminals.  They're trying to fill the 
20110131170415.000|20110131170417.000|TR0|vacuum left by police that are mostly 
20110131170417.000|20110131170420.000|TR0|absent in the streets right now.
20110131170420.000|20110131170422.000|TR0|
20110131170422.000|20110131170425.000|TR0|In addition to that, most of the shops are 
20110131170425.000|20110131170427.000|TR0|closed, so that's meant that it is harder 
20110131170427.000|20110131170430.000|TR0|for people to get basic goods.  The price 
20110131170430.000|20110131170432.000|TR0|of bread we're told has gone up.  The 
20110131170432.000|20110131170435.000|TR0|price of cigarettes, for example. And we

20110131170843.000|20110131170845.000|TR0|revolutionary situations. Acting boldly to 
20110131170845.000|20110131170848.000|TR0|prevent more disarray and more chaos 
20110131170848.000|20110131170851.000|TR0|offers the best chance for an orderly 
20110131170851.000|20110131170853.000|TR0|outcome."

20110131172337.000|20110131172339.000|TR0|at the rate it did over the last several 
20110131172339.000|20110131172342.000|TR0|decades.
20110131172342.000|20110131172344.000|TR0|
